biotools.summary: ClaMSA is tool that uses machine learning to classify sequences that are related to each other via a tree. It takes as input a tree and a multiple sequence alignment (MSA) of sequences and outputs probabilities that the MSA belongs to given classes.

bioschemas.name: ClaMSA
bioschemas.summary: ClaMSA is tool that uses machine learning to classify sequences that are related to each other via a tree. It takes as input a tree and a multiple sequence alignment (MSA) of sequences and outputs probabilities that the MSA belongs to given classes.
